features: Made of 100% recycled polyester microfleece that feels wickedly soft and light, provides steadfast warmth and dries quickly
Full-length zipper extends through a stand-up collar for soft warmth and protection
Set-in sleeves provide chafe-free comfort and a wide range of motion; cleanly finished cuffs and hem feel smooth and soft on the skin
Handwarmer pockets protect your hands; vertical chest pocket secures with a zipper
Hip length; provides additional coverage and pairs well with a hipbelt or harness
